meanings.sent1: Tommy finked on his friend by telling the teacher about the stolen candy.
meanings.sent2: She finked on her brother by revealing his secret to their parents.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel finked on the other animals by stealing their nuts.
meanings.sent4: The spy finked on his own team, jeopardizing the entire mission.
meanings.sent5: The loyal dog never finked on his owner, even when tempted with treats.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she finked on her brother for eating the last cookie.
meanings.sent2: He finked on his classmates by revealing the answer to the test.
meanings.sent3: The cat finked on the dog, blaming him for knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The witness finked on the suspect, providing crucial evidence to the police.
meanings.sent5: The little bird finked on its siblings, claiming the biggest worm for itself.
